thread.title: Danielle Lloyd brands Nicola McLean 'disgusting' over CBB star reminds Kim Woodburn she's not a mother with brutal baby slur
thread.title_full: Danielle Lloyd brands Nicola McLean 'disgusting' over CBB star reminds Kim Woodburn she's not a mother with brutal baby slur

author: mirror
title: Danielle Lloyd brands Nicola McLean 'disgusting' over CBB star reminds Kim Woodburn she's not a mother with brutal baby slur
text:
Celebs Danielle Lloyd brands Nicola McLean 'disgusting' over CBB star reminds Kim Woodburn she's not a mother with brutal baby slur The mother-of-three said it was an 'evil and nasty comment to make' as Kim had a stillborn baby at a young age Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Nicola McLean hits Kim Woodburn with brutal 'baby' slur Share this video Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing!   
Danielle Lloyd has branded Nicola McLean "disgusting" after she brutally reminded Kim Woodburn she's not a mother. 
The 35-year-old glamour model was embroiled in a vicious spat over this week's nominations with the How Clean Is Your House star on Celebrity Big Brother on Monday night, which turned nasty when the 74-year-old star said she nominated Nicola because she had told lies about her. 
Nicola tried to confront Kim, but she said: "I will not rise to your bait." 
In a bid to silence Nicola, she added: "Grow up, you're a mum." Kim and Nicola. (Photo: Channel 5) 
However, she took things one step further, when she pointed out that Kim - who previously opened up on the Channel 5 show about having a stillborn baby - doesn't have children and insisted she is willing to get "lower" with her rude remarks. 
She fumed back: "And you're not, that's your problem. If you to go low, I'll go lower." 
After witnessing the feud unfold, Danielle, 33 - who's ex-husband Jamie O'Hara has been teaming up on Kim with Nicola in the house - took to Twitter in dismay and said she felt psychically "sick" by Nicola's "nasty" comments. (Photo: TV Grab) 
She wrote: "What an evil nasty comment to make!! Some women can't have children!! ... Kim had a still born baby at 23 & that comment has actually made me feel sick as a mum am disgusted & I'd never say that to another women (sic). Read More Nicola McLean hits Kim Woodburn with brutal 'baby' slur without knowing about star's heartbreaking stillborn burial confession 
In reply to comments from her followers, who pointed out that Nicola may not know about Kim's stillborn baby, she added: "It doesn't matter how can a woman say that to another women there is people out there who can't have children! Vile ... It doesn't matter if she knew or not there is women out there who can't have kids! So it's a disgusting comment ... No the comment actually made me sick. 
"Never ever should a woman say that to another women lots of women out there can't have kids ... I actually got upset!! That comments probably brought back very upsetting memories for her (sic)" 
Nicola's official Twitter account has posted a message saying Nicola will be "devastated" when she finds out about Kim's past trauma. Read More 
It read: "She'll be devastated when she gets out of the house and finds out what Kim went through (sic)" Like us on Facebook
